attributes.action: Change the electoral system in the UK to Single Transferable Vote
attributes.additional_details:
STV is explained well in this video: https://youtu.be/l8XOZJkozfI
In short, it keeps constituencies and all their benefits whilst getting rid of the unrepresentative system we currently have.
attributes.background: Currently in the general elections in the UK people vote for who they want to represent their constituency, whoever has the most votes becomes a Member of Parliament, even if it is less than 50%. This results in unfair results in which most people's votes are not represented. STV solves this.
